WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 19 DEC
   BY M/V PGS APOLLO TOWING SIX 400 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-46.74S 040-00.80W, 21-46.90S 039-24.56W,
   22-14.81S 039-24.63W, 22-14.65S 040-01.00W,
   22-12.91S 040-00.98W, 22-12.25S 040-00.54W,
   22-11.69S 040-00.28W, 22-10.75S 040-00.07W,
   22-09.14S 040-00.05W, 22-06.17S 040-00.63W,
   22-05.62S 040-00.93W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3104/22.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 200001Z DEC 22.
